data.name: Runner
data.detailed_description:
Runner is a first/third-person Survival game.
Explore the Wilderness, build your own Fortress, Or just loot some Lost Houses. Play alone or with a friend, and fight against the undead.
It's your life you have to Save.

Build

Build Your own Save Space to be safe against the undead or even just other Survivors!

Stay at Home

You can decide to Just stay in any Haunted House and get your self comfortable.

loot

Loot Some Haunted houses Or just the Wilderness because you might need everything you gather! (Spoiler: You have to loot!)

Your life, Your decisions

You decide what you want to do, who you want to help, or just even do your own thing.
It's Your decision.

Resources

Gather resources and collect everything you need to build your empire from the ground up.

Survivors

You have the decision if you want to survive on your own or find friends (of course, only if they won't kill you!)
You can build fortresses together.

Explore

Explore the nature or any lost Houses and gather everything together you need to survive in the wilderness.

data.short_description: On Runner, it's your decision what you do. Loot Houses or just live in the wilderness and build your own home. Just do your own thing because in Runner you can't do anything wrong.
